description: This file defines a function to create an API client for the backend, including support for mock fallback and methods to fetch products and create checkouts.

methods.name: createApiClient()
methods.description: Creates and returns an API client object with methods to interact with backend endpoints.

methods.name: http(path, options = {})
methods.description: Performs an HTTP fetch request to the specified path with given options.

methods.name: getProducts
methods.description: Fetches a list of products from the backend, supports query parameters.

methods.name: getProductById
methods.description: Fetches details of a single product by its ID.

methods.name: createCheckout
methods.description: Creates a checkout session with the provided payload.
